attributes.action: Stop Gina Miller challenging the will of the people with Brexit
attributes.background: The People of Great Britain have Voted to leave the European Union.  Gina Miller is going against the majority by taking legal action regarding Brexit. We want her to stop interfering and let the Goverment deliver Brexit.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for private individuals taking legal action. The courts are independent of Parliament and Government.
